mapper.select:
SELECT z.*, CASE WHEN cStatus = '0' THEN CONCAT('{','\"name\":\"车道指示灯双面正向通行\",','\"stype\":','\"',z.sdevType,'\"',',','\"controlMsg\":150,','\"sendAddress\":','\"',z.devId,'#',p.plc_id,'\"','}') WHEN cStatus = '1' THEN CONCAT('{','\"name\":\"车道指示灯双面正向通行\",','\"stype\":','\"',z.sdevType,'\"',',','\"controlMsg\":105,','\"sendAddress\":','\"',z.devId,'#',p.plc_id,'\"','}') WHEN cStatus = '2' THEN CONCAT('{','\"name\":\"车道指示灯双面正向通行\",','\"stype\":','\"',z.sdevType,'\"',',','\"controlMsg\":153,','\"sendAddress\":','\"',z.devId,'#',p.plc_id,'\"','}') ELSE '' END controlInfo FROM (SELECT t.dev_id devId, t.sdev_type sdevType, t.direction, t.pile_no pileNo, cdd.comm_status commStatus, CASE WHEN CONCAT(cdd.sa_position,cdd.frontfork_status,cdd.frontarrow_status,cdd.backfork_status,cdd.backarrow_status) = '10110' THEN '0' WHEN CONCAT(cdd.sa_position,cdd.frontfork_status,cdd.frontarrow_status,cdd.backfork_status,cdd.backarrow_status) = '11001' THEN '1' WHEN CONCAT(cdd.sa_position,cdd.frontfork_status,cdd.frontarrow_status,cdd.backfork_status,cdd.backarrow_status) = '11010' THEN '2' WHEN CONCAT(cdd.sa_position,cdd.frontfork_status,cdd.frontarrow_status,cdd.backfork_status,cdd.backarrow_status) = '00110' THEN '3' WHEN CONCAT(cdd.sa_position,cdd.frontfork_status,cdd.frontarrow_status,cdd.backfork_status,cdd.backarrow_status) = '01001' THEN '4' WHEN CONCAT(cdd.sa_position,cdd.frontfork_status,cdd.frontarrow_status,cdd.backfork_status,cdd.backarrow_status) = '01010' THEN '5' END cStatus, 'PLC' controlType, IFNULL(b.error_code,'0') errorStatus, CASE WHEN b.error_code IS NOT NULL THEN b.error_desc ELSE '' END errorDesc FROM tobj_dev_basic t RIGHT JOIN rt_cdd_workstatus cdd ON t.dev_id = cdd.dev_id LEFT JOIN rt_break_down_workstatus b ON cdd.dev_id = b.dev_id) z LEFT JOIN conf_plc_dev p ON z.devId = p.dev_id WHERE 1=1
and z.devId = #{devId}

SELECT z.*, CASE WHEN cStatus = '0' THEN CONCAT('{','\"name\":\"车道指示灯单面通行\",','\"stype\":','\"',z.sdevType,'\"',',','\"controlMsg\":6,','\"sendAddress\":','\"',z.devId,'#',p.plc_id,'\"','}') WHEN cStatus = '1' THEN CONCAT('{','\"name\":\"车道指示灯单面通行\",','\"stype\":','\"',z.sdevType,'\"',',','\"controlMsg\":9,','\"sendAddress\":','\"',z.devId,'#',p.plc_id,'\"','}') ELSE '' END controlInfo FROM (SELECT t.dev_id devId, t.sdev_type sdevType, t.direction, t.pile_no pileNo, cd.comm_status commStatus, CASE WHEN CONCAT(cd.sa_position,cd.frontfork_status,cd.frontarrow_status) = '101' THEN '0' WHEN CONCAT(cd.sa_position,cd.frontfork_status,cd.frontarrow_status) = '110' THEN '1' WHEN CONCAT(cd.sa_position,cd.frontfork_status,cd.frontarrow_status) = '001' THEN '2' WHEN CONCAT(cd.sa_position,cd.frontfork_status,cd.frontarrow_status) = '010' THEN '3' END cStatus, 'PLC' controlType, IFNULL(b.error_code,'0') errorStatus, CASE WHEN b.error_code IS NOT NULL THEN b.error_desc ELSE '' END errorDesc FROM tobj_dev_basic t RIGHT JOIN rt_cd_workstatus cd ON t.dev_id = cd.dev_id LEFT JOIN rt_break_down_workstatus b ON cd.dev_id = b.dev_id) z LEFT JOIN conf_plc_dev p ON z.devId = p.dev_id where 1=1
and z.devId = #{devId}

SELECT z.*, CASE WHEN cStatus = '0' THEN CONCAT('{','\"name\":\"射流风机\",','\"stype\":','\"',z.sdevType,'\"',',','\"controlMsg\":1,','\"sendAddress\":','\"',z.devId,'#',p.plc_id,'\"','}') WHEN cStatus = '1' THEN CONCAT('{','\"name\":\"射流风机\",','\"stype\":','\"',z.sdevType,'\"',',','\"controlMsg\":2,','\"sendAddress\":','\"',z.devId,'#',p.plc_id,'\"','}') WHEN cStatus = '2' THEN CONCAT('{','\"name\":\"射流风机\",','\"stype\":','\"',z.sdevType,'\"',',','\"controlMsg\":4,','\"sendAddress\":','\"',z.devId,'#',p.plc_id,'\"','}') ELSE '' END controlInfo FROM (SELECT t.dev_id devId, t.sdev_type sdevType, t.direction, t.pile_no pileNo, sl.comm_status commStatus, CASE WHEN CONCAT(sl.sa_position,sl.sl_f_on,sl.sl_r_on,sl.sl_off) = '1100' THEN '0' WHEN CONCAT(sl.sa_position,sl.sl_f_on,sl.sl_r_on,sl.sl_off) = '1010' THEN '1' WHEN CONCAT(sl.sa_position,sl.sl_f_on,sl.sl_r_on,sl.sl_off) = '1001' THEN '2' WHEN CONCAT(sl.sa_position,sl.sl_f_on,sl.sl_r_on,sl.sl_off) = '0100' THEN '3' WHEN CONCAT(sl.sa_position,sl.sl_f_on,sl.sl_r_on,sl.sl_off) = '0010' THEN '4' WHEN CONCAT(sl.sa_position,sl.sl_f_on,sl.sl_r_on,sl.sl_off) = '0001' THEN '5' END cStatus, 'PLC' controlType, IFNULL(b.error_code,'0') errorStatus, CASE WHEN b.error_code IS NOT NULL THEN b.error_desc ELSE '' END errorDesc FROM tobj_dev_basic t RIGHT JOIN rt_sl_workstatus sl ON t.dev_id = sl.dev_id LEFT JOIN rt_break_down_workstatus b ON sl.dev_id = b.dev_id) z LEFT JOIN conf_plc_dev p ON z.devId = p.dev_id WHERE 1=1
and z.devId = #{devId}

SELECT z.*, CASE WHEN cStatus = '0' THEN CONCAT('{','\"name\":\"加强照明\",','\"stype\":','\"',z.sdevType,'\"',',','\"controlMsg\":1,','\"sendAddress\":','\"',z.devId,'#',p.plc_id,'\"','}') WHEN cStatus = '0' THEN CONCAT('{','\"name\":\"加强照明\",','\"stype\":','\"',z.sdevType,'\"',',','\"controlMsg\":2,','\"sendAddress\":','\"',z.devId,'#',p.plc_id,'\"','}') ELSE '' END controlInfo FROM (SELECT t.dev_id devId, t.sdev_type sdevType, t.direction, t.pile_no pileNo, zm.comm_status commStatus, CASE WHEN CONCAT(zm.sa_position,zm.zmhl_close) = '10' THEN '0' WHEN CONCAT(zm.sa_position,zm.zmhl_close) = '11' THEN '1' WHEN CONCAT(zm.sa_position,zm.zmhl_close) = '00' THEN '2' WHEN CONCAT(zm.sa_position,zm.zmhl_close) = '01' THEN '3' END cStatus, 'PLC' controlType, IFNULL(b.error_code,'0') errorStatus, CASE WHEN b.error_code IS NOT NULL THEN b.error_desc ELSE '' END errorDesc FROM tobj_dev_basic t RIGHT JOIN rt_zmhl_workstatus zm ON t.dev_id = zm.dev_id LEFT JOIN rt_break_down_workstatus b ON zm.dev_id = b.dev_id) z LEFT JOIN conf_plc_dev p ON z.devId = p.dev_id WHERE 1=1
and z.devId = #{devId}

SELECT t.dev_id devId, t.sdev_type sdevType, t.direction, t.pile_no pileNo, covi.comm_status commStatus, IFNULL(b.error_code,'0') errorStatus, CASE WHEN b.error_code IS NOT NULL THEN b.error_desc ELSE '' END errorDesc, CONCAT('{','\"name\":\"covi\",','\"stype\":','\"',t.sdev_type,'\"',',','\"co\":',covi.co_value,',','\"vi\":',covi.vi_value,'}') cDataShow FROM tobj_dev_basic t RIGHT JOIN rt_covi_workstatus covi ON t.dev_id = covi.dev_id LEFT JOIN rt_break_down_workstatus b ON covi.dev_id = b.dev_id where 1=1
and t.dev_id = #{devId}

SELECT t.dev_id devId, t.sdev_type sdevType, t.direction, t.pile_no pileNo, tw.comm_status commStatus, IFNULL(b.error_code,'0') errorStatus, CASE WHEN b.error_code IS NOT NULL THEN b.error_desc ELSE '' END errorDesc, CONCAT('{','\"name\":\"温湿度仪\",','\"stype\":','\"',t.sdev_type,'\"',',','\"windSpeed\":',tw.windSpeed_value,',','\"windDir\":',tw.windDir_value,'}') cDataShow FROM tobj_dev_basic t RIGHT JOIN rt_tw_workstatus tw ON t.dev_id = tw.dev_id LEFT JOIN rt_break_down_workstatus b ON tw.dev_id = b.dev_id where 1=1
AND t.dev_id = #{devId}

SELECT t.dev_id devId, t.sdev_type sdevType, t.direction, t.pile_no pileNo, la.comm_status commStatus, IFNULL(b.error_code,'0') errorStatus, CASE WHEN b.error_code IS NOT NULL THEN b.error_desc ELSE '' END errorDesc, CONCAT('{','\"name\":\"光度仪\",','\"stype\":','\"',t.sdev_type,'\"',',','\"laValue\":',la.la_value,'}') cDataShow FROM tobj_dev_basic t RIGHT JOIN rt_la_workstatus la ON t.dev_id = la.dev_id LEFT JOIN rt_break_down_workstatus b ON la.dev_id = b.dev_id where 1=1
AND t.dev_id = #{devId}

SELECT t.dev_id devId, t.sdev_type sdevType, t.direction, t.pile_no pileNo, cg.comm_status commStatus, IFNULL(b.error_code,'0') errorStatus, CASE WHEN b.error_code IS NOT NULL THEN b.error_desc ELSE '' END errorDesc, CONCAT('{','\"name\":\"超高\",','\"stype\":','\"',t.sdev_type,'\"',',','\"sh_alarm_single\":',cg.sh_alarm_single,',','\"sh_error_single\":',cg.sh_error_single,'}') cDataShow FROM tobj_dev_basic t RIGHT JOIN rt_cg_workstatus cg ON t.dev_id = cg.dev_id LEFT JOIN rt_break_down_workstatus b ON cg.dev_id = b.dev_id where 1=1
AND t.dev_id = #{devId}

SELECT t.dev_id devId, t.sdev_type sdevType, t.direction, t.pile_no pileNo, IFNULL(hab.comm_status,0) commStatus, IFNULL(b.error_code,'0') errorStatus, CASE WHEN b.error_code IS NOT NULL THEN b.error_desc ELSE '' END errorDesc, CASE WHEN hab.comm_status IS NOT NULL THEN 1 WHEN hab.comm_status IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE '' END alarmType FROM tobj_dev_basic t LEFT JOIN rt_firealarm_workstatus hab ON t.dev_id = CONCAT(hab.device_id,card_id,component_id) LEFT JOIN rt_break_down_workstatus b ON t.dev_id = b.dev_id WHERE t.sdev_type = 'HAB'
AND t.dev_id = #{devId}

SELECT t.dev_id devId, t.sdev_type sdevType, t.direction, t.pile_no pileNo, IFNULL(hab.comm_status,0) commStatus, IFNULL(b.error_code,'0') errorStatus, CASE WHEN b.error_code IS NOT NULL THEN b.error_desc ELSE '' END errorDesc, CASE WHEN hab.comm_status IS NOT NULL THEN 1 WHEN hab.comm_status IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE '' END alarmType FROM tobj_dev_basic t LEFT JOIN rt_firealarm_workstatus hab ON t.dev_id = CONCAT(hab.device_id,card_id,component_id) LEFT JOIN rt_break_down_workstatus b ON t.dev_id = b.dev_id WHERE t.sdev_type = 'YG'
AND t.dev_id = #{devId}

SELECT t.dev_id devId, t.sdev_type sdevType, t.direction, t.pile_no pileNo, gwgl.comm_status commStatus, IFNULL(b.error_code,'0') errorStatus, CASE WHEN b.error_code IS NOT NULL THEN b.error_desc ELSE '' END errorDesc, gwgl.fire_alarm alarmType, gwgl.rt_highest_temp alarmTemp FROM tobj_dev_basic t RIGHT JOIN rt_fire_temp_workstatus gwgl ON t.dev_id = gwgl.dev_id LEFT JOIN rt_break_down_workstatus b ON gwgl.dev_id = b.dev_id WHERE 1=1
AND t.dev_id = #{devId}

SELECT cj.fstr_loopgroupid devId, t.sdev_type sdevType, t.direction, t.pile_no pileNo, IFNULL(cj.comm_status,0) commStatus, IFNULL(b.error_code,'0') errorStatus, CASE WHEN b.error_code IS NOT NULL THEN b.error_desc ELSE '' END errorDesc, cj.fint_vh vh, cj.fint_speed vspeed, cj.fint_occupy voccupy FROM tobj_dev_basic t RIGHT JOIN rt_loopgroup_workstatus cj ON t.dev_id = LEFT(cj.fstr_loopgroupid,3) LEFT JOIN rt_break_down_workstatus b ON cj.fstr_loopgroupid = b.dev_id where 1=1
AND t.dev_id LIKE concat('%',#{devId},'%')

SELECT t.dev_id devId, t.sdev_type sdevType, t.direction, t.pile_no pileNo, 0 commStatus, IFNULL(b.error_code,'0') errorStatus, CASE WHEN b.error_code IS NOT NULL THEN b.error_desc ELSE '' END errorDesc, camera.dev_ip devIp, camera.dev_port devPort, camera.dev_user username, camera.dev_pwd password FROM tobj_dev_basic t RIGHT JOIN tobj_dev_camera camera ON t.dev_id = camera.dev_id LEFT JOIN rt_break_down_workstatus b ON camera.dev_id = b.dev_id where 1=1
AND t.dev_id = #{devId}

SELECT t.dev_id devId, t.sdev_type sdevType, t.direction, t.pile_no pileNo, phone.comm_status commStatus, IFNULL(b.error_code,'0') errorStatus, CASE WHEN b.error_code IS NOT NULL THEN b.error_desc ELSE '' END errorDesc, CASE WHEN phone.phone_status = '0003' THEN '0' WHEN phone.phone_status = '0004' THEN '1' ELSE '2' END cStatus FROM tobj_dev_basic t RIGHT JOIN rt_phone_workstatus phone ON t.dev_id = phone.phone_num LEFT JOIN rt_break_down_workstatus b ON phone.phone_num = b.dev_id WHERE phone.phone_num IS NOT NULL AND t.dev_id IS NOT NULL
AND t.dev_id = #{devId}

SELECT t.dev_id devId, t.sdev_type sdevType, t.direction, t.pile_no pileNo, 0 commStatus, IFNULL(b.error_code,'0') errorStatus, CASE WHEN b.error_code IS NOT NULL THEN b.error_desc ELSE '' END errorDesc, IFNULL(board.close_or_not,'1') cStatus FROM tobj_dev_basic t LEFT JOIN handle_boradcast_play board ON t.dev_id = board.play_broadcast LEFT JOIN rt_break_down_workstatus b ON t.dev_id = b.dev_id WHERE t.sdev_type = 'BROADCAST'
AND t.dev_id = #{devId}
